name: Shield of Power
description:
Solve puzzles and fight monsters to acquire new abilities for your magic shield! Journey through three unique environments and defeat the bosses to collect them all. 

Controls 

  • W - move up
  • A   - move left
  • S   - move down
  • D  - move right
  • DPad- move (if the player gets stuck try using the D-Pad instead of the keyboard)
  • Shield Button (orange) - casts light, fire, or ice depending on which gem is selected
  • Gem Buttons - used to select which power will be used
  • Bash Button (purple) / Hold Left Alt - shield bash attack
  • Text Box - press to continue
  • Press full screen to get all user interface features
  • Navigate to different levels from the main menu
